products.name: Arizona SFB VL
products.description: The women's Arizona SFB VL by Birkenstock is the ultimate summer sandal. It features a soft durable suede on the upper, combined with adjustable straps and a magical cork footbed that conforms to the shape of your foot. A truly custom fit is as effortless as the classic design.

products.name: Alpha Force 88
products.description: It's time to act as the Alpha in the Air, and the Force on the court with the reintroduction of the Nike Alpha Force 88, which was one of the very few sneakers that MJ wore that wasn't one of his beloved signature sneakers. The Alpha Force 88 returns in the classic White and Uni Red colourway, featuring a customizable strap and a textured leather upper.

products.name: Gel-NYC
products.description: Arriving just in time for the long-awaited summer season, the ASICS Gel-NYC takes inspiration from a number of classic ASICS styles, including the GEL-NIMBUS™ 3 and the MC-PLUS V design. The retro design on the upper paired with a combination of lightweight foams and GEL™ technology inserts ensure that this silhouette is stylish yet super comfortable.

products.name: Samba OG
products.description: Once designed by Adi Dassler himself, to provide football players with the right footwear, the adidas Samba gave its debut at the end of the 1940s and has since then changed the game on and off the pitch. The latest version of the adidas Samba comes as an original copy of the ‘50s silhouette, made with a full-grain leather upper, suede overlays and flat panel stitching.

products.name: Chuck 70 Fall Tone
products.description: The iconic Converse Chuck 70 has been updated to prepare you for the cooler weather, equipped with a fall-ready colourway combined with classic elements such as OrthoLite cushioning, the classic egret midsole and faux leather All Star patch, maintaining this silhouette's timeless look.

The New Balance 9060 nods to the iconic 99X series with a streamlined upper that pays homage to the era of 990s, while sporting a tongue logo inspired by the original 991 lace jewel. Crafted with a mix of mesh and suede, the bold sneaker has ABZORB and SBS cushioning.
